import React, { useState } from 'react' import UserTable from './tables/UserTable' import AddUserForm from './forms/AddUserForm' const App = () => { const usersData = [ { id: 1, name: 'Tania', username: 'floppydiskette' }, { id: 2, name: 'Craig', username: 'siliconeidolon' }, { id: 3, name: 'Ben', username: 'benisphere' }, ] const [users, setUsers] = useState(usersData) const addUser = user => { user.id = users.length + 1 setUsers([ ...users, user ]) } const deleteUser = id => { setUsers(users.filter(user => user.id !== id)) } return (
